title: (x) Skylink logo in Dallas airport - Avenir {Jan E}
content:
Need help with this one - this is the logo for the Skylink in Dallas’ airport.

Any help would be great!

Thanks,  
Chris

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163619im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/skylinkcrop_5275.jpg)

 [‹ Looking for a typeface similar to Klavika](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163619/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37229 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Beatles typeface, used for Across the Universe poster - hand drawn {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163619/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37383 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marketplicity

comments.content:
That’s Avenir, although the s seems a bit skinny.

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107163619/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=avenir "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=avenir")
